author: terence0083
content:
From prysm side, we have started experimenting some of the DAS changes. Currently it's split into three parts, 1.) extend beacon chain objects to satisfy das 2.) new helper methods 3.) new processing methods

https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/8178
https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/8175
https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/8179

They are still experimental but was able to help us raise some good questions and concerns
